data.text:
『A place where the dreams of many Uma Musume 
lies, The Twinkle Series! Just who will be the 
one to leave their name at that summit――!』
data.name: Television
data.processed:
󠁿『A place where the dreams of many Uma Musume 
󠁿lies, The Twinkle Series! Just who will be the 
󠁿one to leave their name at that summit――!』

data.text: That stage, was a faraway place that we all admired.
data.name: Katsuragi Ace
data.processed: 󠁿That stage, was a faraway place that we all admired.

data.text:
Amazing, amazing! Those Uma Musume are so fast! 
They go whoosh just like the wind!
data.name: Laid-back Girl
data.processed:
󠁿Amazing, amazing! Those Uma Musume are so fast! 
󠁿They go whoosh just like the wind!

data.text:
As expected, the intensity of the Twinkle Series is different! 
Hey, Cameraman! Focus more on the ones in front!
data.name: Brusque Man
data.processed:
󠁿As expected, the intensity of the Twinkle Series is different! 
󠁿Hey, Cameraman! Focus more on the ones in front!

data.text:
Out in the sticks where there's not much to do, 
the TV seemed to show a bright and vivid scene. 
Everyone would say it's almost like 『Another World』.
data.name: Katsuragi Ace
data.processed:
󠁿Out in the sticks where there's not much to do, 
󠁿the TV seemed to show a bright and vivid scene. 
󠁿Everyone would say it's almost like 『Another World』.

data.text: But that's wrong, isn't it?
data.name: Katsuragi Ace
data.processed: 󠁿But that's wrong, isn't it?

data.text:
That place is under the same sky. 
It's just really far away, for now.
data.name: Katsuragi Ace
data.processed:
󠁿That place is under the same sky. 
󠁿It's just really far away, for now.

data.text: That's why, I will――!
data.name: Katsuragi Ace
data.processed: 󠁿That's why, I will――!

data.text:
What's my dream, is it? Of course, it's to win races! If they're 
an Uma Musume, then I think they'd all say the same thing.
data.name: Scout-seeking Uma Musume
data.processed:
󠁿What's my dream, is it? Of course, it's to win races! If they're 
󠁿an Uma Musume, then I think they'd all say the same thing.

data.text: Let's aim for the top together.
data.processed: 󠁿Let's aim for the top together.

data.text:
My dream is to guide an Uma Musume to win G1s and 
defeat famous Uma Musume from around the world――

choices.text: I want to be that kind of Trainer

data.processed:
󠁿My dream is to guide an Uma Musume to win G1s and 
󠁿defeat famous Uma Musume from around the world――

data.text:
I see, I guess a Trainer would have that kind of dream. You're 
free to have big dreams like that. Let's both do our best! See ya!
data.name: Scout-seeking Uma Musume
data.processed:
󠁿I see, I guess a Trainer would have that kind of dream. You're 
󠁿free to have big dreams like that. Let's both do our best! See ya!

data.text:
……I had intended to scout her, but, 
it seems she didn't think I was serious.

choices.text: ……Too big of a dream, I guess.

data.processed:
󠁿……I had intended to scout her, but, 
󠁿it seems she didn't think I was serious.

data.text:
A new trainer talking about big dreams. No matter how serious I am, 
I guess it just looks unrealistic from others' perspective.
data.processed:
󠁿A new trainer talking about big dreams. No matter how serious I am, 
󠁿I guess it just looks unrealistic from others' perspective.

data.text: HaaaAAAAAA!!
data.name: Katsuragi Ace
data.processed: 󠁿HaaaAAAAAA!!

data.text: Haa, haa, haa……haa……
data.name: Katsuragi Ace
data.processed: 󠁿Haa, haa, haa……haa……

data.text:
……damn. I guess that wasn't enough…… 
Haa……was that last attack too shallow? ……Huu!
data.name: Katsuragi Ace
data.processed:
󠁿……damn. I guess that wasn't enough…… 
󠁿Haa……was that last attack too shallow? ……Huu!

data.text:
I wonder just how long she had been running. 
There was already so much sweat pouring down her face.
data.processed:
󠁿I wonder just how long she had been running. 
󠁿There was already so much sweat pouring down her face.

data.text:
It wasn't that she was showing amazing speed, nor was she 
showing enough strength to line up with the others.
data.processed:
󠁿It wasn't that she was showing amazing speed, nor was she 
󠁿showing enough strength to line up with the others.

data.text:
It was as if she was just letting her 
power run wild, a feverish run.
data.processed:
󠁿It was as if she was just letting her 
󠁿power run wild, a feverish run.

data.text:
But why was it? I couldn't take my eyes off of her. It was 
like she was chasing something with an unquenchable fire――
data.processed:
󠁿But why was it? I couldn't take my eyes off of her. It was 
󠁿like she was chasing something with an unquenchable fire――

data.text:
Haa-……! Alright. I can still keep going. 
This isn't all I've got――
data.name: Katsuragi Ace
data.processed:
󠁿Haa-……! Alright. I can still keep going. 
󠁿This isn't all I've got――

data.text:
What a run……! 
Excuse me, can we talk for a bit!?
data.name: Veteran Trainer A
data.processed:
󠁿What a run……! 
󠁿Excuse me, can we talk for a bit!?

data.text:
S-so cool~……! So this is what a real run feels like…… 
Um, can I talk to you too……
data.name: Nervous-looking Uma Musume
data.processed:
󠁿S-so cool~……! So this is what a real run feels like…… 
󠁿Um, can I talk to you too……

data.text:
She noticed the commotion and turned to look. 
There, there were many trainers and Uma Musume, and――
data.processed:
󠁿She noticed the commotion and turned to look. 
󠁿There, there were many trainers and Uma Musume, and――

data.text:
……Huu. Sorry, I haven't run enough yet. 
I feel bad, but it'll have to wait for next time. See ya.
data.name: Mr. C.B.
data.processed:
󠁿……Huu. Sorry, I haven't run enough yet. 
󠁿I feel bad, but it'll have to wait for next time. See ya.

data.text:
That Uma Musume retreated from the people around her 
and kept running on the course. Judging by their 
attention, she must be an Uma Musume of some acclaim.
data.processed:
󠁿That Uma Musume retreated from the people around her 
󠁿and kept running on the course. Judging by their 
󠁿attention, she must be an Uma Musume of some acclaim.

data.text:
But, for me――I turned my gaze back towards the earlier Uma Musume. 
But she wasn't there anymore……
data.processed:
󠁿But, for me――I turned my gaze back towards the earlier Uma Musume. 
󠁿But she wasn't there anymore……

data.text: Haa, haa, haa……!
data.name: Mr. C.B.
data.processed: 󠁿Haa, haa, haa……!

data.text: ……Hahaa! That fierce gaze I've been feeling……
data.name: Mr. C.B.
data.processed: 󠁿……Hahaa! That fierce gaze I've been feeling……

data.text: Shaaaaaaaa!!
data.name: Katsuragi Ace
data.processed: 󠁿Shaaaaaaaa!!

data.text: So it was you? Katsuragi Ace.
data.name: Mr. C.B.
data.processed: 󠁿So it was you? Katsuragi Ace.

data.text:
Yo, C.B.ー……! You seem bored, huh? 
Haa……shall I accompany you!?
data.name: Katsuragi Ace
data.processed:
󠁿Yo, C.B.ー……! You seem bored, huh? 
󠁿Haa……shall I accompany you!?

data.text:
Is that an invite for some parallel running? I was thinking 
of taking a quick shower and then going for a walk though――
data.name: Mr. C.B.
data.processed:
󠁿Is that an invite for some parallel running? I was thinking 
󠁿of taking a quick shower and then going for a walk though――

data.text: Haa……Hehe, but you're in, right?
data.name: Katsuragi Ace
data.processed: 󠁿Haa……Hehe, but you're in, right?

data.text: ……sounds good, let's play!
data.name: Mr. C.B.
data.processed: 󠁿……sounds good, let's play!

data.text:
I moved to a place I could see both of them running clearly. 
As the noise grew, there was a change in the running of the two.
data.processed:
󠁿I moved to a place I could see both of them running clearly. 
󠁿As the noise grew, there was a change in the running of the two.

data.text:
Oooh, what intensity……! 
She's pulling further away from her opponent!
data.name: Veteran Trainer A
data.processed:
󠁿Oooh, what intensity……! 
󠁿She's pulling further away from her opponent!

data.text:
Amazing……C.B.ーsan, it's like she's cutting through the wind…… 
Katsuragi Ace-san can't keep up!
data.name: Nervous-looking Uma Musume
data.processed:
󠁿Amazing……C.B.ーsan, it's like she's cutting through the wind…… 
󠁿Katsuragi Ace-san can't keep up!

data.text:
It was a run almost like a real race. 
But only one Uma Musume was the center of attention――
data.processed:
󠁿It was a run almost like a real race. 
󠁿But only one Uma Musume was the center of attention――

data.text:
The was a wonderful run! Mr. C.B., please let me be the one 
to instruct you! With me, you'll be on the road to victory!
data.name: Veteran Trainer A
data.processed:
󠁿The was a wonderful run! Mr. C.B., please let me be the one 
󠁿to instruct you! With me, you'll be on the road to victory!

data.text:
Ahaha. I'll gladly accept just those feelings. 
Sorry, but I need to get going.
data.name: Mr. C.B.
data.processed:
󠁿Ahaha. I'll gladly accept just those feelings. 
󠁿Sorry, but I need to get going.

data.text: Ah, C.B.ーsan!
data.name: Nervous-looking Uma Musume
data.processed: 󠁿Ah, C.B.ーsan!

data.text:
Everyone that had gathered followed after 
Mr. C.B. and left. And then――
data.processed:
󠁿Everyone that had gathered followed after 
󠁿Mr. C.B. and left. And then――

data.text: Haa, haa……cough, haa……haa……
data.name: Katsuragi Ace
data.processed: 󠁿Haa, haa……cough, haa……haa……

data.text: The one standing there with ragged breath――
data.processed: 󠁿The one standing there with ragged breath――

data.text:
Damn……haa, haa…… 
As I thought, I lost, huh……damnit……!
data.name: Katsuragi Ace
data.processed:
󠁿Damn……haa, haa…… 
󠁿As I thought, I lost, huh……damnit……!

data.text:
Haa……I guess, trying to escape from that position…… 
against C.B.……haa, haa……haa……
data.name: Katsuragi Ace
data.processed:
󠁿Haa……I guess, trying to escape from that position…… 
󠁿against C.B.……haa, haa……haa……

data.text:
Just being able to finish the race after that run was great. 
But even still, there will be frustration.
data.processed:
󠁿Just being able to finish the race after that run was great. 
󠁿But even still, there will be frustration.

data.text:
Should I just comfort her with 『Do your best next time』? 
Even if I wasn't her trainer, I probably shouldn't 
leave her on her own if she was feeling down――
data.processed:
󠁿Should I just comfort her with 『Do your best next time』? 
󠁿Even if I wasn't her trainer, I probably shouldn't 
󠁿leave her on her own if she was feeling down――

data.text: Haa……everyone's turning their backs on me……
data.name: Katsuragi Ace
data.processed: 󠁿Haa……everyone's turning their backs on me……

data.text:
They're underestimating me, huh. No, I'm not even on their radar? 
……I guess that's expected.
data.name: Katsuragi Ace
data.processed:
󠁿They're underestimating me, huh. No, I'm not even on their radar? 
󠁿……I guess that's expected.

data.text:
――Hahaa! I'll show them, for sure……!! Just watch me, 
this is the only time you'll be able to keep laughing!
data.name: Katsuragi Ace
data.processed:
󠁿――Hahaa! I'll show them, for sure……!! Just watch me, 
󠁿this is the only time you'll be able to keep laughing!

data.text:
Someday…… 
it'll be all of you chasing after my back……!
data.name: Katsuragi Ace
data.processed:
󠁿Someday…… 
󠁿it'll be all of you chasing after my back……!
